title: Stripped
description: After escaping the elevator, Kelly Flynn goes home with John Taylor, the Dom she has a crush on. Why? Because she has fallen completely, madly in love with the man. And what woman in her right mind wouldn’t fall in love with him? To Kelly’s mind, John is perfect. Or is he?After a night of insane, mind-blowing, heart stopping, toe curling, sheet biting sex – Kelly discovers that John Taylor has a secret. One that threatens to destroy every feeling Kelly had for him. What possible explanation could he have for his behavior? Before long it seems both of them will soon be stripped of more than their clothes.
author: Nikki Sex
